member.name: M:ForgeServerManager.SettingManager.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new SettingManager and loads settings from file specified. If file specified doesnt exist, a new one is created upon save()

member.name: M:ForgeServerManager.SettingManager.GetSetting(System.String)
member.summary: Get value of specified setting if exists. If setting doesnt exist, KeyNotFound exception is thrown

member.name: M:ForgeServerManager.SettingManager.AddSetting(System.String,System.String)
member.remarks: Save() function should be called to save changes

member.name: M:ForgeServerManager.SettingManager.Save
member.summary: Saves settings to file. Any new settings added are also saved
